from sklearn.neural_network import MLPClassifier
import pandas as pd
X = pd.read_csv('behavior_feature_upsampled.csv')
X_val = pd.read_csv('behavior_feature_val_upsampled.csv')
train_y_up = pd.read_csv('train_y_up_upsampled.csv')
val_y = pd.read_csv('val_y_upsampled.csv')

from sklearn.metrics import average_precision_score
from sklearn.metrics import roc_auc_score
#default setting
print(average_precision_score(val_y['label'],y_pred))
print(roc_auc_score(val_y['label'],y_pred))

from sklearn.preprocessing import normalize
X_normalize = normalize(X.loc[:,'diff':],axis=0)
X_val_normalize = normalize(X_val.loc[:,'diff':],axis=0)

import time
start = time.time()
for t in train['cleaned review']:
    text_object = NRCLex(t)
    nrcli.append(list(text_object.affect_frequencies.values()))
print(time.time()-start)

nrcli_val = []
start = time.time()
for t in val['cleaned review']:
    text_object = NRCLex(t)
    nrcli_val.append(list(text_object.affect_frequencies.values()))
print(time.time()-start)

train = train[['ex_id', 'user_id', 'prod_id', 'rating',

from imblearn.over_sampling import RandomOverSampler
ros = RandomOverSampler()
train_X_ros, train_y_ros = ros.fit_sample(train,train['label'].values)
train_X_up = pd.DataFrame(train_X_ros, columns = train.columns)
train_y_up = pd.DataFrame(train_y_ros)

#combine nrc and upsampled behavior
clf = MLPClassifier(learning_rate='adaptive',early_stopping=True).fit(train_X_up.loc[:,'diff':],
                                                                      train_X_up['label'].values )
preds = clf.predict_proba(val.loc[:,'diff':])[:,1]

from sklearn.linear_model import LogisticRegression
from sklearn import naive_bayes
from sklearn.metrics import average_precision_score
from sklearn.metrics import roc_curve, auc
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
def trainlr(BoW_train_X,train_y_up,BoW_val_X,val_y):
    lr = LogisticRegression(max_iter=20,C=0.001,tol=1e-2)

    lr.fit(BoW_train_X, train_y_up)
    preds_nb = lr.predict_proba(BoW_val_X)[:,1]
    plt.plot([0, 1], [0, 1], 'k--')
    plt.xlim([0.0, 1.0])
    plt.ylim([0.0, 1.0])
    plt.xlabel('FPR')
    plt.ylabel('TPR')
    plt.title('ROC')

    nb_fpr, nb_tpr, nb_thresholds = roc_curve(val_y, preds_nb)
    nb_roc_auc = auc(nb_fpr, nb_tpr)
    ap = average_precision_score(val_y, preds_nb)
    nb_curve = plt.plot(nb_fpr, nb_tpr, label = 'LR' + ' (AUC = %0.3f)' % nb_roc_auc+', (AP = %0.3f)' % ap)
    plt.legend(loc='center left', bbox_to_anchor=(1, 0.5))

    plt.show()
    return ap,nb_roc_auc,preds_nb
